RumorFact.Text: A space station orbiting a planet around a green star.

ExploreFact.Text: This space station is a Nomai anomaly research facility orbiting a planet named Emerald Reverie around a green star called Verdant Beacon.

RumorFact.Text: A domed chamber with panoramic views of space. It contains a warp receiver and a path leading deeper into the station.

ExploreFact.Text: A computer in the dome mentions a dormant elevator system requiring multiple anomaly keys to activate.
A computer in the dome lists four anomaly chambers connected to the station’s ring corridor. Each chamber is said to contain a key that powers the elevator system.

RumorFact.Text: The central chamber contains an inactive elevator pad.

ExploreFact.Text: It seems to require four anomaly keys to function.
Once the anomaly keys were gathered, the elevator activated and lowered me to a sealed chamber below the station.

RumorFact.Text: Nomai notes hint at a chamber where sound loops back unnaturally.
The Nomai referred to it as the Echo Cell.

ExploreFact.Text: This room is acoustically engineered. I hear phantom sounds repeating my movements back at me, delayed and distorted.
Solving the sound puzzle in this chamber unlocked an energy node. It appears to power part of the central station.

RumorFact.Text: A log fragment refers to "shifting glyphs that hide the path to knowledge." The Nomai seemed fascinated with this anomaly.
The Nomai referred to it as the Runic Wall.

ExploreFact.Text: The walls are covered in shifting glyphs. Photographing certain symbols in order reveals hidden pathways.
Solving the glyph puzzle triggered a release of another anomaly key.

RumorFact.Text: One chamber is said to contain crystals that bend light to reveal hidden truths.
The Nomai referred to it as the Prism Vault.

ExploreFact.Text: This chamber contains reflective crystals that redirect energy beams. Light and shadow interact with sensors in the room.
Aligning the prisms to redirect beams to all sensors unlocked another anomaly key.

RumorFact.Text: Nomai records warn of magnetic interference disrupting normal instrumentation. They sealed the anomaly behind mechanical locks.
The Nomai referred to it as the Polarizer Lock.

ExploreFact.Text: Magnetic fields interfere with probe signals in this room. I had to align rotating machines using only visual feedback.
Completing the sequence released the final anomaly key for the elevator pad.

RumorFact.Text: The elevator seems to lead to lower floor.

ExploreFact.Text: This massive chamber contains a single anomaly: a cube suspended in stasis fields, humming with faint power.
A log left by a Nomai researcher warns of activating the containment field. They refer to it only as "Object 003 – The Box."
Interacting with the containment controls ends the loop early, returning me to the beginning of the cycle.
